name: GlowRevive Facial Cleanser
description: GlowRevive Facial Cleanser is a gentle and effective formula that helps remove impurities, dirt, and makeup while leaving your skin feeling refreshed, soft, and hydrated. Perfect for daily use on all skin types.

name: SilkStrands Nourishing Shampoo
description: SilkStrands Nourishing Shampoo is enriched with natural ingredients like argan oil and coconut milk to restore moisture and strength to dry, damaged hair. It leaves hair feeling soft, shiny, and manageable with every wash.

name: LushAura Signature Perfume
description: LushAura Signature Perfume offers a blend of floral, fruity, and woody notes that evoke elegance and sophistication. Perfect for both day and evening wear, this fragrance will leave a lasting impression wherever you go.

name: Soothing Hand Cream Set
description: The Soothing Hand Cream Set is a luxurious trio of deeply hydrating hand creams infused with nourishing ingredients like shea butter and vitamin E. Perfect for keeping your hands soft, smooth, and protected throughout the day.
